Name: Bon Bon
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist (discarded) & Bon Bon sweets.
Review: Relive your youth and the taste of those big round sweets with this sweet-n-sour lemony cocktail.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2001 at LAB Bar, London, England. The original drink used vanilla vodka.
Nutrition: One serving of Bon Bon contains 170 calories
